Remark. Although ˜xn is a D-dimensional vector, it only requires a single

10.2.2 M-dimensional Subspace with Maximal Variance
Assume we have found the ﬁrst m−1 principal components as the m−1
eigenvectors of Sthat are associated with the largest m−1 eigenvalues.
